tool_description: Checks technician availability based on schedules, skills, location, and workload capacity for specific time periods.

start_datetime.description: Start of availability window to check

end_datetime.description: End of availability window to check

service_location.description: Address where service will be performed

technician_ids.description: Specific technician IDs to check (if empty, checks all)

error_messages: Invalid time range: start_datetime must be before end_datetime and in the future.
Empty skills list: At least one required skill must be specified.
Invalid location: Service location must be a valid address.
Invalid duration: Estimated duration must be a positive number.
No matching technicians: No technicians found with the required skills.
usage: Provide start_datetime, end_datetime, required_skills, service_location, and estimated_duration. Optionally specify technician_ids to limit search. Returns available technicians with their capacity.

technician_distances.description: Distance in miles from each technician to service location

capacity_percentages.description: Current workload capacity for each available technician (0-100%)

earliest_available_time.description: Earliest time when any qualified technician is available
